article_title: How will Christians vote in the presidential election? It depends
article_text:
It matters which Christians you’re talking about

Issues vary among conservative and liberal, black and white, Protestant and Catholic

Look for candidates to woo these voters by showing up in churches in primary states

article_metadata.title: How will Christians vote in the presidential election? It depends | News & Observer

og.description: Which presidential candidate is going to win the “Christian vote” this year?
